00028 #ifndef qvanilla_h
00029 #define qvanilla_h
00030 
00037 #include "qequeue.h"    /* "Vanilla" kernel uses the native QF event queue  */
00038 #include "qmpool.h"     /* "Vanilla" kernel uses the native QF memory pool  */
00039 #include "qpset.h"      /* "Vanilla" kernel uses the native QF priority set */
00040 
00041                            /* the event queue type for the "Vanilla" kernel */
00042 #define QF_EQUEUE_TYPE              QEQueue
00043 
00044                                         /* native QF event queue operations */
00045 #define QACTIVE_EQUEUE_WAIT_(me_) \
00046     Q_ASSERT((me_)->eQueue.frontEvt != (QEvent *)0)
00047 
00048 #if (QF_MAX_ACTIVE <= 8)
00049     #define QACTIVE_EQUEUE_SIGNAL_(me_) \
00050         QPSet8_insert(&QF_readySet_, (me_)->prio)
00051 
00052     #define QACTIVE_EQUEUE_ONEMPTY_(me_) \
00053         QPSet8_remove(&QF_readySet_, (me_)->prio)
00054 #else
00055     #define QACTIVE_EQUEUE_SIGNAL_(me_) \
00056         QPSet64_insert(&QF_readySet_, (me_)->prio)
00057 
00058     #define QACTIVE_EQUEUE_ONEMPTY_(me_) \
00059         QPSet64_remove(&QF_readySet_, (me_)->prio)
00060 #endif
00061                                          /* native QF event pool operations */
00062 #define QF_EPOOL_TYPE_              QMPool
00063 #define QF_EPOOL_INIT_(p_, poolSto_, poolSize_, evtSize_) \
00064     QMPool_init(&(p_), poolSto_, poolSize_, evtSize_)
00065 #define QF_EPOOL_EVENT_SIZE_(p_)    ((p_).blockSize)
00066 #define QF_EPOOL_GET_(p_, e_)       ((e_) = (QEvent *)QMPool_get(&(p_)))
00067 #define QF_EPOOL_PUT_(p_, e_)       (QMPool_put(&(p_), e_))
00068 
00069 #if (QF_MAX_ACTIVE <= 8)
00070     extern QPSet8  volatile QF_readySet_;
00071 #else
00072     extern QPSet64 volatile QF_readySet_;
00073 #endif
00074 
00075 #endif                                                        /* qvanilla_h */
